DOC.brief_summary: Purpose is to test and validate a new questionnaire (the WELCH questionnaire) to estimate walking capacity in patients with claudication
DOC.detailed_description: Questionnaires (WELCH and WIQ) submitted to patients referred for treadmill walking test Comparison of sore to MWD on treadmill. Comparison with WIQ will be performed
DOC.criteria: informed consent signed, french language fluent patients rejection of the questionnaire
